document_data.mainbody:
Phibs Brogan was a foppish patron of the Elfsong Tavern from the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Phibs was a fashionably dressed gold dwarven man. He had a dusky skin tone, dark brown eyes, and black hair. He kept his head clean-shaven and gathered the trimmed beared into a tied knot.
Notably, Phibs wore a red suit he purchased from Carms Garm, a clothier located on the Wyrms Crossing. Unfortunately, that outfit made him look a lot like Dolor, a Bhaalist serial killer dwarf.
In the , Phibs Brogan was a frequent customer of the Elfsong Tavern in the Eastway neighborhood of Baldurs Gate. He attended the "Laff Riot" show at the Elfong, a stand-up comedy performance hosted by Harvard Willoughby in Elfsongs side room with a stage. Phibs was excited to see the show after his friend, Roanoke "almost pissed himself laughing." Phibs expectations were high as Harvard Willoughby wore a monocle and anyone wearing one was good in the dwarfs book.
